Install Forecasting Packages

Source: R/install_packages.R
install_forecast_packages.Rd

This function helps install all the necessary packages for building an infectious disease forecasting pipeline and hub, including hubverse packages, fable, EpiEstim, EpiNow2, epidatr, and epiforecast packages.

Usage

install_forecast_packages(
  install_delphi = TRUE,
  install_hubverse = TRUE,
  install_forecasting = TRUE,
  install_epi = TRUE,
  install_data = TRUE,
  install_nowcast = TRUE,
  repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org"
)

Arguments

install_delphi

Logical. If TRUE, installs delphi packages. Default is TRUE.

install_hubverse

Logical. If TRUE, installs hubverse packages. Default is TRUE.

install_forecasting

Logical. If TRUE, installs forecasting packages (fable, etc.). Default is TRUE.

install_epi

Logical. If TRUE, installs epidemiological packages (EpiEstim, EpiNow2). Default is TRUE.

install_data

Logical. If TRUE, installs data access packages (epidatr). Default is TRUE.

repos

Character. Repository to install packages from. Default is "https://cloud.r-project.org".

Value

NULL (invisibly)

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Install all packages
install_forecast_packages()

# Install only hubverse packages
install_forecast_packages(install_forecasting = FALSE,
                         install_epi = FALSE,
                         install_data = FALSE,
                         install_nowcast = FALSE)
} # }
